https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rCJICpvo6Av27x9Lfu65iwlNfED.jpg Yet another variation on Mark Twain's "A Connecticut Yankee At King Arthur's Court." Here, a computer malfunction causes a science researcher to be sent back in time with her laptop, which she uses to amaze the court. A Knight in Camelot
